alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:52PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elko County through 315 PM PDT... At 252 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ruby Valley, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ruby Valley and Secret Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
